text: Liberia competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, West Germany. The nation returned to the Olympic Games after missing the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==Results by event== ===Athletics=== Men's 100 metres *Andrew Sartee :* First Heat -- 11.09s (→ did not advance) Men's 800 metres *Thomas O'Brien Howe :* Heat -- 2:00.7 (→ did not advance) Men's 1500 metres *Edward Kar :* Heat -- 4:21.4 (→ did not advance) Men's 4 × 100 m Relay *Andrew Sartee, Thomas O'Brien Howe, Dominic Saidu, and Thomas Nma :* Heat -- DNF (→ did not advance) ==References== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1972 Summer Olympics 1972 Category:1972 in Liberia
title: Liberia at the 1972 Summer Olympics
